channel.title: Spiritual Bodyshop: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rabbi Yom Tov Glaser
channel.description: When you dent your car you take it to the shop, but where do you go to fix up your soul? Hear a down to earth talk on a viable option for spiritual repair.
